Package tools

Class SampleAnalyser

java.lang.Object
tools.SampleAnalyser
public final class SampleAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object
Comprises static methods to analyze samples.

In MUSIAL this is done by multi-threading. In detail the cartesian product of a set of FeatureAnalysisEntry and a set of SampleAnalysisEntry instances is generated. For more detail view the respective class documentations.

This results in a set of pairs of FeatureAnalysisEntry and SampleAnalysisEntry objects, each specifying a sample that is analyzed against a reference genome region (which may be a single gene or the whole genome). For each such pair a SampleAnalyserRunnable is initialized and run.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Constructor Details

    • SampleAnalyser

      public SampleAnalyser()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static VariablePositionsTable run​(java.util.HashSet<FeatureAnalysisEntry> referenceEntries, java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArraySet<SampleAnalysisEntry> sampleEntries, ArgumentsParser arguments) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Runs multi-threaded sample analysis.

      Constructs each possible pair of the passed referenceEntries and sampleEntries elements. For each pair a new single-threaded SampleAnalyserRunnable is initialized.

      Parameters:
      referenceEntries - Set of FeatureAnalysisEntry instances. Each specifies a locus on the reference genome.
      sampleEntries - Set of SampleAnalysisEntry instances. Each specifies the `.vcf` file content from one sample.
      arguments - ArgumentsParser containing arguments parsed from command line.
      Returns:
      VariablePositionsTable containing the information returned from each single SampleAnalyserRunnable.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted.

    • addReferenceToVariablePositionsTable

      private static void addReferenceToVariablePositionsTable​(VariablePositionsTable variablePositionsTable, java.util.HashSet<FeatureAnalysisEntry> referenceEntries, me.tongfei.progressbar.ProgressBar progress)
      Adds information from the reference genome specified by the single elements of referenceEntries to the passed variablePositionsTable.
      Parameters:
      variablePositionsTable - VariablePositionsTable containing information about the variant sites of a set of samples against possibly multiple reference loci.
      referenceEntries - Set of FeatureAnalysisEntry instances, each specifying a reference locus.
      progress - ProgressBar instance to visualize progress information to the user.
